<h3 id="X22521">X(22521) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th ANTI-BROCARD TO 1st BROCARD-REFLECTED</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^8-6*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(b^2-3*b*c-c^2)*(b^2+3*b*c-c^2)*a^4+2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*b^2*c^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22521) = 4*X(3398)-X(7470) = 2*X(5007)+X(12110)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3).</p>
<p>X(22521) lies on these lines:
{4,3172}, {5,20088}, {6,7709}, {32,262}, {61,22523}, {62,22522}, {83,15819}, {98,5008}, {99,5097}, {182,22676}, {376,5050}, {385,7697}, {511,12150}, {576,3972}, {1003,5093}, {1656,7900}, {2080,3329}, {2548,9754}, {2782,12191}, {3398,7470}, {3524,19661}, {3533,10155}, {5007,12110}, {5171,7878}, {5188,9751}, {5306,14651}, {5480,9862}, {5999,11842}, {6179,10358}, {6194,7787}, {7694,9753}, {7757,15520}, {7785,20576}, {9166,14160}, {10789,22650}, {10790,22655}, {10791,22697}, {10792,22699}, {10793,22700}, {10794,22703}, {10795,22704}, {10797,22705}, {10798,22706}, {10799,22711}, {10800,22713}, {10801,22729}, {10802,22730}, {10803,22731}, {10804,22732}, {11364,22475}, {11380,22480}, {11490,22556}, {11837,22668}, {11838,22672}, {11839,22698}, {11840,22709}, {11841,22710}, {12176,12212}, {12835,18971}, {13860,21309}, {13885,22720}, {13938,22721}, {14537,14639}, {14693,17005}, {14912,15428}, {18502,22681}, {18993,19063}, {18994,19064}, {22520,22680}</p>
<p>
X(22521) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (6, 10788, 11676), (32, 262, 21445)<br>
</p>
